tv.generator-info-name: Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v1.0

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: In 1958, Richard Cue was adopted as a baby. For years, he has longed to find his birth mother. And the story of Tania searching for her Iranian father who she last heard from more than thirty years ago.

programme.title: Parkinson In Australia
programme.sub-title: 1981: Doug Walters, Artie Johnson, Joanne Worley, Gordon Chater
programme.desc: Michael Parkinson interviews guests Doug Walters, Artie Johnson, Joanne Worley and Gordon Chater.

The world watches as Hamas hands over Israeli hostages. Victoria is in the grip of a car theft crisis. Plus Sarah Ferguson interviews Treasurer Jim Chalmers about the governments superannuation changes.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with whats happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Planet America
programme.desc: Trumps peace plan achieves a breakthrough in Gaza, but is it "everlasting"? No peace in DC as the shutdown continues, and another Trump enemy is crossed off the list after the indictment of NY Attorney General Letitia James.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the days top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Restoration Australia
programme.desc: The 1960s introduced us to shag rugs, lava lamps, minimalism and bright, open spaces. Melbourne couple Laura and Reece are leaving inner Melbourne for suburbia, with plans to restore a modernist home to its former glory.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The roadshow comes from Clissold Park in Stoke Newington, London.

programme.title: Hard Quiz
programme.desc: Tom Gleeson hosts Australias favourite quiz show. Expert topics are Scooby-Doo, The Salvation Army, The Big Lebowski film and masked metal band, Slipknot. Only one winner can take home the Big Brass Mug!

programme.title: I Was Actually There
programme.desc: How did it feel to watch from the 92nd floor of the World Trade Center, as the first 9/11 plane hit the building opposite?

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Follow the story with the latest on the days events, explaining whats happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe uncovering what you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow.

programme.title: Four Corners
programme.desc: Donald Trump has long boasted of his wealth, is he now using his office to enrich himself and his family? John Lyons examines Trumps vast network of foreign deals, hotels and crypto, and accusations of conflicts of interest.

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Chiropractor Steph and husband Alex try to build a sleek contemporary family farmhouse on old farmland, an ambition shes held for 20 years. But lack of money leads to extended living in a caravan and a total redesign.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Australias longest running music TV show, rage is home to the biggest vault of music videos from a diverse range of artists, genres and eras. We curate the best clips of all time to surprise and entertain you for hours.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: Josh Byrne puts the finishing touches to his greenhouse project; Costa Georgiadis meets a generous footpath gardener; Jane Edmanson explores some fragrant foliage and Steven Wells visits a garden set up for families in need.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with whats happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Pilgrimage: The Road Through The Alps
programme.desc: The pilgrims wake up in the rolling foothills of the Alpstein massif in Switzerland and follow the Camino to Urnasch to see the towns lively cattle show. Later, they see monks sing Salve Regina, a choral prayer. (Final)

programme.title: Media Watch
programme.desc: Trumps involvement in the Gaza ceasefire deal coincides with the Nobel Peace Prize announcement. An Oz motoring journalist with a car marketing side hustle. Proposed FOI changes result in less freedom for less information.

programme.title: Anhs Brush With Fame
programme.desc: Gai Waterhouse is the leading lady of Australian horse-racing. She took over the family stable in 1992, became one of the top trainers of all time, and even worked for the Queen. How will Anh capture her verve and charisma?

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The roadshow descends on the biomes of the Eden Project in Cornwall.

programme.title: Hard Quiz
programme.desc: His Royal Hardness, Tom Gleeson, quizzes his challengers knowledge of Jurassic Park, Elvis, Ex-PM Gough Whitlam and not-very-successful basketball team, the Charlotte Hornets. Who will hold aloft the Big Brass Mug?

programme.title: Hard Quiz
programme.desc: Its the Battle of the Duds! Fan favourites Pru (expert subject: knitting), Sarah (the Kray twins), Cameron (Spider-Man) and James (Breaker Morant) get one more crack at taking home Tom Gleesons Big Brass Mug!

programme.title: The Assembly
programme.desc: Hosted by veteran ABC journalist, Leigh Sales, this week The Assembly sees the Autistic journalism students interview Australian entertainment royalty, Julia Morris.

programme.title: The Business
programme.desc: Australias leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: The Doctors reveal the amazing organs that keep you alive before youre born, Dr Xand meets patients undergoing treatment at a burns clinic, and Dr Chris hits the high street to test another mind-bending trick.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: The Bears switch bedrooms for the night and get a glimpse of the living space of one of their brothers. But the deeper they go, hidden secrets are revealed.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: Unable to declare her love to Adrien, Marinette turns to Cat Noir to help her rehearse. But their closeness is not to everyones liking, starting with Glaciator.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Beast Boy teaches Starfire how to lie and it backfires.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: A bored Shaun dresses up as the Farmer to entertain the flock. Realising he now has the power to boss Bitzer around Shaun takes the opportunity to throw a bit of a party for the flock.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: Dr Chris makes Dr Xand cry to demonstrate how your amazing body makes different types of tears to protect your eyes in different ways, and in Operation Takeover they discover just how dangerous it can be out at sea.

programme.title: Expedition With Steve Backshall
programme.desc: Steve takes on four entirely new adventures to some of the remotest parts in search of precious natural wonders. He unearths secrets of an ancient civilisation and discovers wildlife more at risk than ever before.

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.desc: We dive back into some of the best bits of GGSP! We review the epic action RPG Marvel Ultimate Alliance 3: The Black Order, DARREN tries to remember how memory works, and Rad visits Xbox headquarters!

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: Feeling unappreciated, Ice Bear leaves his brothers to be the chef of a restaurant. Desperate to fill the void, Grizz and Panda look for Ice Bears replacement.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: What if Marinette had no choice but to leave Paris on the day when Shadow Moth decided to create a new supervillain?

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Raven eats a bad meatball.

programme.title: ABC Kids Programs Resume At 4am
programme.desc: ABC Kids programs resume at 4.00am

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: The flock hijack a road line-painting machine and cause chaos while creating giant works of art in the field.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: The Doctors have picked out some of their favourite moments - get ready to see just how strong your tendons really are, and discover who the better pilot is when Dr Chris and Dr Xand join the Air Ambulance.

programme.title: Fresh Off The Boat
programme.desc: When Eddie comes home with lice and infects others in the family, Louis leaves it to Jessica to clean up the mess. Meanwhile, Eddies classmates suffer the consequences when he welches on a bet he made with his teacher.

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous
programme.desc: PR consultant Edina Monsoon wakes up with yet another hangover, but receives no sympathy from her studious daughter, Saffron. When best friend Patsy turns up, the fun continues, until a crisis at work forces Edina into action.

programme.title: A Kind Of Spark
programme.desc: Keedie is in burnout after the drama at school. Can Addie help her and find out what happened in Miss Murphys office all those years ago. Can Frank and Nina find a lost tortoise?

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.sub-title: Valiant Hercule, Work A Miracle! A Challenge From Outer Space
programme.desc: With Beerus gone and the world at peace once more, the Z Fighters resume their normal lives. But nothing ever remains calm, as aliens arrive on Earth to thank and challenge the hero who fought Beerus.

programme.title: The Strange Chores
programme.desc: Charlies stuck walking Wolfman instead of going to a party. He irresponsibly ditches Wolfman, but a little scratch on his neck could spell disaster.

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Robot Robbery
programme.desc: On Science and Technology dress-up day, Patrick is upset when his robot costume is stolen by an unidentified mad professor.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.desc: Feeling inadequate as a superhero, Buttercup bulks up... to the max.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: Clarence and the kids learn all about regenerative farming and treat the soil to a pampering session. Then they create their own day spa to treat themselves.

programme.title: BTN
programme.desc: Gaza Peace Deal; Social Media Q and A; Nobel Peace Prize; Young Surfer; Pencil Pals

programme.title: BTN Newsbreak
programme.desc: Israel is set to receive its hostages from Gaza, as thousands of Palestinians return home.

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: Phil helps divorcees Sylvia and Bill sell their semi thats been loitering on the market for over a year. After 54 years of marriage theyve decided to separate, sell their home, and move on.

programme.title: Austin
programme.desc: Julian is dropped from Big Bears TV deal due to his "reputation", while Ingrid is named creative lead. Austin searches for a British backstory worthy of a book deal.

programme.title: rage Choreography Special
programme.desc: Five-six-seven-eight! rage busts out the biggest, boldest, and most replayed dance routines in music video history.

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Deirdre OKane, Richard Osman and David Mitchell join regular panellist Alan Davies to answer host Sandi Toksvigs questions on the theme of Occupations and Offices.

programme.title: Heartbreak High
programme.desc: When Danielle discovers the body of her deceased neighbour, Danielle and Allie decide to volunteer to an organisation that provides companions for senior citizens.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.sub-title: Vegeta Becomes A Student! Win Over Whis!
programme.desc: When Vegeta finds Whis having lunch with Bulma, he demands he be taken to Beerus. But when Whis reveals hes actually the gods teacher, the stubborn Saiyan prince is willing to beg to become his student. But at what cost?

programme.title: The Strange Chores
programme.desc: When Wolfman appears as Charlies new substitute teacher, school is suddenly a lot more fun. But Charlie has a feeling hes hiding his true intentions.

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Vanishing Koalas
programme.desc: Kakow Koalas are the latest snack sensation sweeping the playground and Mario is hungry for justice when his are stolen.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.sub-title: Take Your Kids To Dooms Day
programme.desc: The Girls spend the day with the Professor at his boring office, only to find that the office comes with a terrible secret.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: Costa and the kids visit a school who have reclaimed a block of land and regenerating it with local, native plants and trees. They need some help weeding and planting.

programme.title: Show Me The Honey!
programme.sub-title: Gravity the Musical, a T-Rex and Vampires on Holiday
programme.desc: Five young beekeepers don their bee suits and open a hive for the first time. After learning how bees see at Bee School, they paint their hives before their own colonies arrive.

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: Phil meets Duncan and Rhonda, a couple with a young baby who are keen to sell up. But after a month on the market, they still havent had any viewings.

programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: The trip across Italy continues with what might be the coolest fire station in the world. George meets a former paralympian transforming an old air ambulance and Will meets DIY enthusiasts building a summer house for free.

programme.title: Unforgotten
programme.desc: When a spine is dredged out of Whitney Marsh, a new case begins for Jess and Sunnys team at Bishop Street CID. Four potential suspects, Juliet, Melinda, Asif, and Marty, each have secrets to hide.

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: Dr. Greene deals with an man having trouble letting go of his dying wife. Dr. Ross works up the nerve to visit Carol after her attempted suicide. An attractive patient and an outbreak of food poisoning bedevils Carter.

programme.title: Moon And Me
programme.desc: Mr Onion looks inside a book and decides to tell a story to his best friend Dibillo. Everybody enjoys watching the story come to life, especially when Mr Onion makes sure all of his friends are in it!

programme.title: Beep And Mort
programme.desc: Mort creates a mysterious invention that no one knows quite what to do with. As they all play with it Beep learns about winning and the power of imagination.

programme.title: Hoopla Doopla!
programme.desc: Squidgie and Jango make a treasure hunt for their friends but after three tries with three different leaders they still havent found the treasure! What are they going to do?

programme.title: The Sound Collector
programme.desc: Moles pot plant has outgrown the house - where can it go?

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Sula are in the park playing at being giants and splashing in puddles with their big welly boots. As they play the puddles get bigger and bigger until Bing slips over in the mud and gets wet everywhere.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George love jumping in muddy puddles, even when its raining - but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After plenty of rest and some warm milk and honey, George is feeling much better.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: Its Timmys birthday and the Flock have thrown a party for him. At first hes delighted by all the attention; but when the Flock become distracted and hes left with no-one to play with, he decides to entertain himself.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Which team will win Malcolms Wildlife Photo Challenge - Mandy and Mike, Sarah and James, Hannah and Joe, or Norman and Jodie?

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: The children are at the Elf Farm, but to learn where milk comes from they must visit a Big Farm, to find cows. They travel to Lucy Bigs Farm, where she shows them all the animals.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends are introduced to some simple woodcraft in the woods with Mr. Wolf.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: Its Spykes first day of training with the cadets on Kangaroo Beach and shes so excited to jump into all the action that she forgets to pay attention in class - learning the hard way that safety always comes first!

programme.title: Super Monsters
programme.desc: The Super Monsters learn empathy and kindness while bringing Doyle, the runaway gargoyle, back home.

programme.title: Nikhil and Jay
programme.sub-title: Nikhil and Jay and the Best Wedding
programme.desc: When Nikhil and Jay realise their parents had two weddings before they were born, they decide to plan them another wedding; the best wedding!

programme.title: Ready Eddie Go!
programme.desc: Nina has hurt her arm and is feeling Fed up. Eddie and Akil team up to put on some special activities to cheer up their friend.

programme.title: Play School Science Time
programme.desc: Why dont some liquids mix? Michelle is glowing with excitement as she creates her own wibbly wobbly lava lamp! Discover why liquids such as oil and water dont mix together in this fun and bubbly experiment.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: D is ready to rock - he has his drumsticks but nothing to bang on. This episode introduces the letter D and the words sat, pad, pan, pin, tap and din.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to visit a house that Mr Bull is building. Who will their new neighbours be?

programme.title: Millie Magnificent
programme.desc: Millie, Ben and Maya get carried away with their school project when they decide to build a scale model of the solar system.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Cynthia is working on the bus so asks Stanley to take her passengers to the Community centre. Seamus, Little Woo, Fred and Fifi are going to play football and have a lot of equipment.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.sub-title: The Power Of Mystery Mountain Part 2
programme.desc: The story continues, after Mystery Mountain breaks out of its dimension and floats over the city.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: Its Spykes first day of training with the cadets on Kangaroo Beach and shes so excited to jump into all the action that she forgets to pay attention in class - learning the hard way that safety always comes first!

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Thomas helps Ruth fix up an old windmill into her new, energy-efficient workshop.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: Tammy and Molly learn about different miniclimates in the garden and even create their own - a terrarium!

programme.title: Wiggle And Learn
programme.desc: Join The Wiggles for a musical adventure exploring emotions! Sing along to Skidamarink and Whenever I Hear This Music, and explore how music makes us feel with Lachy and Dorothy the Dinosaur!

programme.title: Super Monsters
programme.desc: Frankie borrows Katyas wand, bringing carousel horses to life. The Super Monsters unite to corral the ponies, while Katya restores the wand in this fun-filled adventure!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mr Zebra delivers a parcel for Peppa and George from their Auntie Dottie. What could it be?

programme.title: PJ Masks Power Heroes
programme.desc: Owlette and Gekko dont listen to Icecubs knowledge, neither do the Wolfies,

programme.title: The Adventures Of Paddington
programme.desc: Judy gets a Toy Spy Kit, but why is Mrs. Bird being so secretive? Theres only one way to find out lets follow her!

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Mr Elf is overworked so King Thistle sentences him to a holiday. He isnt too pleased. Mrs Elf and Ben however are overjoyed at the news. Meanwhile Nanny takes over the food deliveries.

programme.title: Rocket Club
programme.desc: When a wormhole opens in Tree House Mission Command, Chip walks through into an Alien World across the Galaxy and returns with a six-legged alien bunny. With the wormhole closed, how will they get this strange bunny home?

programme.title: Moon And Me
programme.desc: In the Toy House, Colly Wobble has lost her shoes. In Storyland Moon Baby shows Colly Wobble a magical shoe tree full of different shoes. Colly Wobble chooses the Flippers. What funny, flippy-flappy shoes, Colly Wobble!

programme.title: Beep And Mort
programme.desc: Its mollymelon harvest time. The delicious mollymelons are ripe and ready to eat. As Beep tastes her first mollymelon, the villagers discover she has a new and exciting skill.

programme.title: Hoopla Doopla!
programme.desc: Squidgie lets Bop borrow her favourite plant for a few days to brighten up his workshop, but in the morning the plant looks sick. Bop doesnt want to return the plant until its better so he needs his friends to help.

programme.title: The Sound Collector
programme.desc: The Sound Collector finds a way to record sound from the sky!

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Flop teaches Bing and Pando how to blow bubbles. Pando soon gets the hang of it but Bing struggles and gets frustrated. After many attempts and some gentle guidance from Flop, Bing finally blows a big bubble.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Its the school fete. The top prize in the raffle is a trip in a Hot Air Balloon. Peppa wins! Everyone enjoys the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, it lands in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: Shaun dreams of a life in the fast lane. When Shirley lands upon something that could make his wish come true he cant believe his luck. The only obstacle that stands in his way is the rest of the Flock.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: When the new community library runs out of books, Mandy sends Norman and James on a risky journey to save the grand opening.

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Queen Thistle decides to take a day off, so Holly, Ben, Nanny and the King have to look after the naughty twins Daisy and Poppy for the day. But even all the Elves in the Little Kingdom cant help them stay out of trouble.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa helps Danny Dog with a bedroom make-over on the theme of pirates and sea monsters.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: Gherkinns family visits Kangaroo Beach, eager to see their heroic lifeguard son in action! But when they arrive, they discover GhÃ«rkinn hasnt been entirely truthful with them...

programme.title: Super Monsters
programme.desc: Katya and Dracs flying adventure teaches them to value friendship and Spikes unique journey to happiness.

programme.title: Nikhil and Jay
programme.sub-title: Nikhil and Jay and the Lucky Striker
programme.desc: When Jay plays carrom with Ammammas lucky striker he can finally beat Amma! But when Jay loses the lucky striker his winning streak ends. Nikhil has a plan to help his brother!

programme.title: Ready Eddie Go!
programme.desc: Its Eddies turn to take home the class pet: a gecko! Eddie learns about taking care of another animal, even when hes not in the mood.

programme.title: Play School Science Time
programme.desc: Can you make snow that isnt freezing cold? Theres snow place like home to create your own winter wonderland! Find out how to make your own snow with Alex using bi-carb soda and hair conditioner.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: A and R team up to do a magic card trick, but it keeps going wrong. This episode introduces the AR letter team and the words hat, harp, carp, dark, card, tart, part, jar, car, cart, barn and far.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mr Zebra delivers a parcel for Peppa and George from their Auntie Dottie. What could it be?

programme.title: Millie Magnificent
programme.desc: When Wallace hurts his paw and needs to rest, Millie finds a creative way to carry him around so he doesnt miss out on any of the fun.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Stanley is called to help setup a football pitch so the children can play a match. Its Dino United vs Lunch City!

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: After not listeing to warnings from Newton, Hornwaggle and the PJ Masks, Pirate Robot gets himself and Newton captures by Motsuki. Its when he learns to listen that he is able to escape and rescue newton.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: Gherkinns family visits Kangaroo Beach, eager to see their heroic lifeguard son in action! But when they arrive, they discover GhÃ«rkinn hasnt been entirely truthful with them...

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: When the Rickety Old Bridge collapses, trapping Toby and Henrietta on the other side of the ravine, Inventor Ruth is asked to build a new one.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: Clarence and the junior gardeners plant a native garden and learn about all their different uses.

programme.title: Wiggle And Learn
programme.desc: Practicing healthy habits will help you to be strong like a superhero! Join Puppet Anthony and The Wiggles for dancing and fitness fun, and lets grow stronger and happier together!

programme.title: Super Monsters
programme.desc: Katyas magic mishap at the library creates chaos, but her Super Monster friends help her fix the mess, teaching her that even a good witch sometimes needs help from others.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: It is Granny and Grandpas anniversary. Peppa and George go to Mr Foxs Shop to find them a present. Mr Foxs Shop sells everything.

programme.title: PJ Masks Power Heroes
programme.desc: Rip and Howler are taking peoples things as part of a silly "treasure hunt".

programme.title: The Adventures Of Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things dont go to plan, will Mrs. Browns clown act save the day?

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Ben and Holly visit the bee hive to see how honey is made. Wise Old Elf is the bee keeper and he proceeds to show the children his special way of collecting honey...

programme.title: Rocket Club
programme.desc: Rocket Club competes in "Gravityball" an exhilarating full-contact flying game of American Football meets Quidditch.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: In 1958, Richard Cue was adopted as a baby. For years, he has longed to find his birth mother. And the story of Tania searching for her Iranian father who she last heard from more than thirty years ago.

programme.title: Hard Quiz
programme.desc: Its the Battle of the Duds! Fan favourites Pru (expert subject: knitting), Sarah (the Kray twins), Cameron (Spider-Man) and James (Breaker Morant) get one more crack at taking home Tom Gleesons Big Brass Mug!
